roleset.name: allow

example.name: sentential action
example.text: Each right entitles the shareholder to buy $100 face amount of 13.5% bonds due 1993 and warrants to buy 23.5 common shares at 30 cents a share.
example.arg: to buy $100 face amount of 13.5% bonds due 1993 and warrants to buy 23.5 common shares at 30 cents a share.

example.name: sentential action with passive extraction
example.text: This is because a Delaware court earlier this year said that Drexel is entitled to get its money back before or at the same time as the limited partners.
example.arg: to get its money back before or at the same time as the limited partners.

example.name: PP entitled-to, passivized
example.text: The buy-out group is also entitled to $16 million to repay a fund created by the pilots union for an employee stock ownership plan.
example.arg: to $16 million to repay a fund created by the pilots union for an employee stock ownership plan.

example.name: ARG2 and ARG1
example.text: Now the children of Chinese women and foreign men will also be entitled to ROC nationality -LRB- as the children of Chinese men and foreign women always have been -RRB- , thus realizing equal treatment under the law for men and women .
example.arg: the children of Chinese women and foreign men
thus realizing equal treatment under the law for men and women

roleset.note: ENTITLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'entitle' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'name'. Revised by Olga. (from entitle.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: assign a name

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Your editorial mockingly entitles this legislation the `` Lawyers ' Employment Act . ''

example.name: headless relative
example.text: In a recent investment letter entitled ``Winners of the `Leverage Wars,'''...

roleset.note: ENTITLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'entitle' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'name'. Revised by Olga. (from entitle.02-v predicate notes)
